original_title: Queer Cruising Double Feature: Gay Semiotics & AveMaria
overview: This double feature, dedicated to the most honorable of pursuits begins with gaysemiotics - an exploration of the rules and language of cruising culture featuring an all gay cast of models, actors, dancers and one scientist. AveMaria is an ode to the fading queer utopia formerly known as Manhattan.
title: Queer Cruising Double Feature: Gay Semiotics & AveMaria
